title: [Gameplay] Gothic Orianna bug
body:
When playing with the Gothic Orianna skin, I noticed that her pink neck thing would move into her head when she has the ball on her while she is walking. I have attached a picture to show what I have described. 
Thank you.

replies.body: I noticed this, last patch. But I kept forgetting to report it.
Thanks for the report, we'll take a look and see what's going on!
